kits.name: IL Data Portability Law
kits.description: This test kit is meant to provide information on the level of conformance to the Israeli regulation regarding health data portability

children.name: Check there is a CapabilityStatement
children.details:
Check GET metadata returns a CapabilityStatement.
 Applications SHALL return a resource that describes the functionality of the server end-point.
 https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/http.html#capabilities 
 RESTful servers are required to provide this resource on demand. Servers SHALL specify what resource types and operations are supported 
 https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/capabilitystatement.html#notes

children.name: CapabilityStatement Content-Type
children.description: IF CapabilityStatement was returned, check Content-Type validity
children.details: The response headers from /metadata must include Content-Type: application/fhir+json
